name: Offroad 4x4 Car Parking Driver, Multi Level Park
name_original: Offroad 4x4 Car Parking Driver, Multi Level Park
description:
Ume Offroad 4x4 Car Parking Driver
Do you want to challenge your own skills for offroad 4x4 car park driving ? It is a good season to car park real 4x4 offroad vehicles. This free car parking game is designed for you. Enjoy the realistic physics, variety of offroad 4x4 vehicles such as hummer and jeep. Travel over hills, mountains, desserts freely. Ride in canyons and climb high and be the hill climber. Damage your vehicle, use precise off road vehicle physics. You can play the game with your kid ( boy or girl ) and teach him or her


Features:
- 3 game play modes ( free roam, car parking, world cup winning challenge )
- Massive 16 km square open map to drive, travel and discover, unlimited 4x4 offroad car driving experience
- HD quality environments such as mountains, hills, dirt roads
- New improved graphics ( Higher brightness, contrast and extra sharpness )
- Car parking game play with unrivalled fun, multi level system
- Car park detectors ( drive aids )
- 8 amazing 4x4 offroad vehicles ( including jeep and hummer )
- Real time smoke, dirt, dust, damage, sound effects
- Realistic off roading vehicle physics
- Upgradable car parts ( motor, brake, grip, steer, etc... )
- Upgradable car add ons ( boost jump and car damage repair )
- Upgradable car visuals ( colors and tires )
- Different camera options ( including interior camera with turning steer wheel )
- Easy to use vehicle controls ( including tilt control )
- Daily missions. Free gifts and rewards
- Time challenge to collect winning world cups
- This game is suitable for children and kids ( boy or girl )

Support
Please email us or use our social media about anything you need to state
We will be delighted if you enlighten us about new features you want in our games.

Thank you
We wish for you the best real game play experience in 2016
This free game developed by ume games ( ultra mad entertainers )
